package.name: Techinflo_Instamojo
package.summary: Techinflo Instamojo Payment gateway helps the magento customer to utilize the feature of making payments online using Debit/Credit Cards and also through Net banking as well.
package.description:
Techinflo Instamojo Payment gateway helps the magento customer to utilize the feature of making payments online. All you need to have is a instamojo account and payment link to receive the payments.
This extension avails; 1. Debit Card Payments 2. Credit Card Payments 3. Net Banking Payments
package.notes:
